entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers. Periods of rain beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of ice pellets this evening then to periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon.
